# PhysicsPrismaticJoint

**Structure**

A joint that allows movement along a straight line, similar to a sliding drawer.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PhysicsPrismaticJoint
```

## Overview

`PhysicsPrismaticJoint`, also called a “slider joint”, allows one linear degree of freedom along the x-axis between two [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity] pins.



## Initializers

- **init(pin0:pin1:linearLimit:checksForInternalCollisions:)**: Creates a new prismatic joint.

## Instance Properties

- **linearLimit**: A limit of the translation between the pins in the direction of the x-axis.

## Built-in joint types

- **PhysicsRevoluteJoint**: A joint that allows one degree of rotational freedom between two entity pins, similar to a door swinging on its hinges.
- **PhysicsSphericalJoint**: A spherical joint that allows free rotational movement between two entities’ pins.
- **PhysicsCustomJoint**: A joint with six degrees of freedom that can be individually specified.
- **PhysicsDistanceJoint**: A joint that maintains a minimum and maximum distance between two entity pins.
- **PhysicsFixedJoint**: A joint that rigidly connects two entity pins, with zero degrees of freedom.
- **PhysicsJoints**: A collection of physics joints.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- PhysicsJoint
